en: The Throne of $kingdom$ has a new owner $king$

cz: 特殊人物$ren$降临这个世界
ch: 歷史人物$ren$來到這個世界

en: The Throne of $kingdom$ has been lost，$king$ is the last king

cz: $kingdom2$向$kingdom$发动了一场天命争夺战争
en: $kingdom$ has been challenged，$kingdom2$ is taking its mandate of heaven away
ch: $kingdom2$向$kingdom$发动了一场天命争夺战争

cz: $kingdom2$和$kingdom$之间的收复战争结束了赢家是$winner$
en: The reclaim war between $kingdom2$ and $kingdom$ has ended，the winner is $winner$
ch: $kingdom2$和$kingdom$之间的收复战争结束了赢家是$winner$

en: The usurpation in $kingdom$ has ended，the usurper is $first$
The Vassal War has started in $kingdom$，the instigator is $first$
The Vassal War has ended in $kingdom2$，the victor is $first$
